channel.title: Comments on: Apache Module Idea mod_ping

item.title: By: John Beimler
item.dc:creator: John Beimler
item.description: Check out <a href="http://www.mod-pubsub.org/" rel="nofollow">mod_pubsub</a>, sounds similar to what you're talking about, although it does hold open a socket connection, which can get to be a mess with many subscribers.
item.content:encoded: Check out mod_pubsub, sounds similar to what you’re talking about, although it does hold open a socket connection, which can get to be a mess with many subscribers.
